item.scb.spiritual_armor_chestplate.desc: Ek prachin yatra se aaya hua kavach... Ise aadhar tantu par sparsh hote hi nasht ho jayega.
advancements.adv_1.title: Kya main ek bhoot hoon?

advancements.adv_1.descr: Pahli baar aatma roop mein utpann ho
block.scb.weird.descr: Ek adhyatmik paudha jo adhyatmik sthiti ko shuddh karta hai aur aapko bharti ya hawa mein utha sakta hai... Zaroori hai ise boone aur todna.
